Html:
Hi

Just wondering what is the difference is between a Presenter and a PresentationModel?

In the StockTraderRI sometime a presenter is used and sometimes a presentation model is used.

The view has its data context assigned by the presenter or presentation model, so when do you use one instead of the other?

 

Regards

Joe

Hi Joe,

You can find an explanation of these two patterns, their advantages and disadvantages in this article from the Prism documentation.

You can also check the following threads which may be of interest to you as they deal with different aspects of the subject:

  • MVVM != MVP in CAL. Right?
  • Prism: MVVM vs MVP once again
  • Presenter vs. PresentationModel vs. ViewModel vs. Controller


I hope you find this useful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
